original_title: 學友 . 經典世界巡迴演唱》香港站 再見篇
overview: From 2016 to 2019, Jacky Cheung held 233 concerts for his A Classic Tour in 27 months. The Cantopop king sang, danced and reinterpreted 40 of his classic hits – including "Love is Eternal," "I'm Really Hurt," "Messy Hair" and "Legend of a Hungry Wolf" – for a remarkable show that audiences will remember for a long time.
title: Jacky Cheung A Classic Tour Finale Hong Kong
